text: The Cuba women's national under-20 volleyball team represents Cuba in women's under-20 volleyball Events, it is controlled and managed by the Cuban Volleyball Federation that is a member of North American volleyball body North, Central America and Caribbean Volleyball Confederation (NORCECA) and the international volleyball body government the Federation Internationale de Volleyball (FIVB). ==Results== ===FIVB U20 World Championship=== Champions Runners up Third place Fourth place {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" |- !colspan=9|FIVB U20 World Championship Championship Information |- !Year !Round !Position !
